content: However, there is hope for my friend. But it’s going to take a lot of courage. Itstarts with experiencing more stimuli related to the rewards of his goal. This stimuli can be in the form of telling his friends he hates his job and wants something new. It could be in actually looking for other jobs. It could be entertaining thoughts and feelings — negative about his current job and positive about other prospects. Educating himself. Being around people who are successfully doing what he wants to do. All of these things can contribute to him eventually taking the action he truly wants.
